hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: A community-driven resource for Ashtanga Yoga

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Start Ashtanga is a free, open-source resource for Ashtanga Yoga. We help newcomers begin their practice and experienced practitioners deepen their understanding and connect with each other.

approach.title: Our approach
approach.text: We honour the Jois lineage while representing all dedicated teachers fairly, respecting the many voices within the tradition.

items.title: Open
items.description: Knowledge should circulate freely. Everything here is open-source and free from commercial interests.

items.title: Authentic
items.description: We honour the Mysore lineage by sharing the practice as close to how it's taught in Mysore as possible, while welcoming beginners where they are.

items.title: Community-driven
items.description: This project belongs to the community. It grows through contributions, translations, feedback, and the lived experience of practitioners everywhere.

support.title: Support us
support.text: Start Ashtanga is a labor of love, built and maintained by volunteers. Your donation helps cover domain costs, hosting, and the countless hours that go into creating and maintaining this resource. Every contribution, no matter how small, helps keep this project free and accessible to all.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.text: Have questions, suggestions, or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

cta.title: Want to help?
cta.text: Start Ashtanga is built by the community. Learn how you can contribute.
